Brief:

Opera News is a premier news app delivering a rich selection of global and national news to your fingertips. It provides a personalized news experience, tailored to your interests, and presents the latest insights across various domains such as entertainment, economy, technology, and sports. The app leverages a robust AI engine to curate content and offers unique features like Instaclips, football team tracking, and data-saving reading modes.
